short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends the current date in 'since:YYYY-MM-DD' format to X's search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension automatically appends the current date in the format 'since:YYYY-MM-DD' to X's search bar, making it easier for users to perform searches limited to recent results. Save time and streamline your search experience with just one click.

Privacy First:

No data is collected or extracted from your browsing activity.
The extension does not track, store, or share any personal information.
All actions are performed locally on your device to ensure maximum privacy and security.
Enjoy a fast and safe search enhancement, with zero compromise on your privacy.
